Package it.unipr.ingegneria.impl

Class WineShop

java.lang.Object
it.unipr.ingegneria.entities.Shop
it.unipr.ingegneria.impl.WineShop
All Implemented Interfaces:
IObserver, IStoreManager<Wine>, IUserManager, java.io.Serializable
public class WineShop
extends Shop
implements IUserManager, IStoreManager<Wine>, IObserver
The WineShop is a class for the manage the wine and people inside the shop.
See Also:
IUserManager, IObservable, IObserver, IStoreManager, Serialized Form
